publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3547 Hugh Henry: The Draft Civil Partnership Act 2004 (Consequential Amendments) (Scotland) Order 2005—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Civil Partnership Act 2004 (Consequential Amendments) (Scotland) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*

S2M-3547 Hugh Henry: The Draft Civil Partnership Act 2004 (Consequential Amendments) (Scotland) Order 2005—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Civil Partnership Act 2004 (Consequential Amendments) (Scotland) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson
